name: Super Box Box (Demo)
description:
SUPER BOX BOX DEMO Foreword

Hop and bop your way through plenty of levels throughout the multiple worlds. Use your main mechanic to place your own platforming boxes and interact with the multiple gimmicks (more gimmicks coming post-demo!) to make your way to the exit. Collect coins for a higher score, or attempt a one-sitting speedrun, while enjoying a retro-style banger of a chiptune soundtrack.

This is a work in progress, feel free to leave feedback, both positive and negative, to help us improve future versions of the game! Thank you for playing! <3

---------------------------------

CONTROLS

The game supports both keyboard and gamepad input (no mouse).

Movement:

Keyboard: WASD / Arrow Keys

Gamepad: Left Stick / D-pad

Jump:

Keyboard: Space

Gamepad: South Button / Right Trigger

(Un-)Freeze:

Keyboard: Shift, Z, F, Control

Gamepad: West Button, Left Trigger

Enter Door/Portal:

Keyboard: W / Up Arrow

Gamepad: Left Stick Up / D-pad Up / North Button

---------------------------------

CREDITS

Kepsert: Programming, art, music, SFX, game design, level design.

Kage: Level design, environmental art support.
